mapper.insert: INSERT INTO work.post ( MEMBER_MEMBER_ID, POST_CATEGORY, POST_TITLE ) VALUES( #{member_id}, #{post_category}, #{post_title} )
mapper.select: SELECT P.POST_VIEW, P.POST_RECOM, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_ID, M.MEMBER_NIC FROM work.POST P, work.MEMBER M WHERE P.MEMBER_MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID

SELECT P.POST_ID, P.BOOKMARK, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_VIEW, P.POST_RECOM, P.POST_CATEGORY, C.CONTENT, P.MEMBER_MEMBER_ID FROM work.POST P, work.POST_CONTENT C WHERE P.POST_ID = C.POST_POST_ID AND P.POST_ID = ${post_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE work.post SET POST_VIEW = POST_VIEW + 1 WHERE POST_ID = #{post_id}
